template.template: Template SNMP AudioCodes Mediant Software E-SBC
template.name: Template SNMP AudioCodes Mediant Software E-SBC

item.name: Highest alarm severity on the device
Device description
item.description: A textual description of the entity. This value should include the full name and version identification of the system's hardware type, software operating-system, and networking software.

item.name: Device uptime
item.description: The time since the network management portion of the system was last re-initialized.

httptest.name: Acesso Web {HOST.HOST}
httptest.agent: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 6.1; WOW64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/38.0.2125.104 Safari/537.36

trigger.name: Alto volume de chamadas em Cajamar - Chamadas ativas: {ITEM.VALUE1}
trigger.description:
Chamadas ativas: {ITEM.VALUE1}
.......................................................................... Verificar servios Genesys Foco no SIP
Ligar nos DDRs diretos 11-4890-5463 --- 4873-1436 --- CAN 0300-762-8872 11-4890-5469 --- 4873-1438 --- SNAC 0300-711-5566 11-4890-5470 --- 4873-1439 --- CIN 0800-776-0013
Se do nosso lado estiver tudo certo. Solicitar via Torre Tecnica, a abertura de chamado na VIVO.

trigger.expression: {Template SNMP AudioCodes Mediant Software E-SBC:web.test.fail[Acesso Web {HOST.HOST}].last(#1)}<>0 and {Template SNMP AudioCodes Mediant Software E-SBC:web.test.fail[Acesso Web {HOST.HOST}].last(#2)}<>0
trigger.name: Erro de acesso Web {HOST.HOST}

trigger.expression: {Template SNMP AudioCodes Mediant Software E-SBC:acSysModuleHAStatus.last()}=1 or {Template SNMP AudioCodes Mediant Software E-SBC:acSysModuleHAStatus.last()}=4 or {Template SNMP AudioCodes Mediant Software E-SBC:acSysModuleHAStatus.last()}=5
trigger.name: HA Status - ({ITEM.LASTVALUE})
trigger.description: HA Status Abrir chamado para responsveis informando o HA Status do equipamento. Critico pois essencial para o funcionamento correto do SBC.

trigger.expression: {Template SNMP AudioCodes Mediant Software E-SBC:acSysStateGWSeverity.last(#1)}<>0 and {Template SNMP AudioCodes Mediant Software E-SBC:acSysStateGWSeverity.last(#2)}<>0 and {Template SNMP AudioCodes Mediant Software E-SBC:acSysStateGWSeverity.last(#3)}<>0
trigger.name: Verificar alarme na aplicao e-SBC
trigger.description:
Dados de acesso em:
G:\Share\Diretoria Superintendente\Diretoria de Servicos\Servios a Clientes\Command Center\Sistemas de Monitorao\Acesso - Servidores Monitorao.xlsx

item.host: Template SNMP AudioCodes Mediant Software E-SBC
